attributes.action: Not to loan money to Jaguar Land Rover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is made in relation to the loan of money from the government to Jaguar Land Rover, currently under consideration/discussion.

It is not acceptable for the Government to be aggressively pursuing the green agenda while at the same time, loaning money to a vehicle manufacturer who only produce high value, large capacity vehicles.
